companyName: Collins Legal Group, LLC - Baltimore, MD
description:
A personal injury can severely upend a person's life and have significant physical, financial and emotional ramifications. At Collins Legal Group, LLC - a Baltimore, Maryland, law firm - we understand all that is at stake for our clients, and we know that a speedy resolution is just as important as a favorable one. We dedicate a tremendous amount of our time, care and energy toward fighting for our clients' rights, pursuing the maximum amount of compensation and helping them return to their normal lives as quickly as possible.

Early in her career, attorney Tiffani Collins represented clients in a variety of personal injury and wrongful death matters. Since founding our law firm, she has expanded her area of focus to include probate and estate administration, family law and employment law. Now, she adeptly represents clients in and out of the courtroom in the following matters:

  • Car crashes
  • Trucking accidents
  • Construction accidents
  • Medical malpractice
  • Birth injuries
  • Brain injuries
  • Animal bites
  • Workers' compensation
  • Premises liability
  • Wills
  • Wrongful termination
  • Discrimination
  • Traffic tickets
  • Divorce
  • Child custody
  • Child support
  • Adoption
  • Domestic violence and neglect
  • Civil rights

Ms. Collins founded Collins Legal Group, LLC, in 2013 out of a deep commitment to Baltimore and the people who call the city home. She strives to make connections with each possible client, which she begins doing during the free initial consultation.

Ms. Collins understands that people turn to her boutique law firm for support through some of the most difficult times of their lives. She always remains accessible through in-person and virtual appointments and, when necessary, accepts credit cards as payment. She uses her 10 years of trial experience and long-standing reputation in the legal community to zealously advocate for clients and obtain the justice they deserve.
